page.title: 11MEDIA
page.content: {RADIO}The local radio stations area Beacon, BRMB, Radio WM, Mercia Sound, Radio Shropshire, Radio Trent, and Radio Wyvern. We can get all of these radio channels on our radio. Radio WM is short for Radio West Midlands. Radio WM is different to the other channels because it is a BBC radio station all the others are Independent Radio. The most populart radio stations in our area are Beacon and Radio One. {NEWSPAPERS}The Stourbridge News and the Chronicle are two free papers. These newspapers tell us things like, local news,job vacancies, they have lost and found pets, advertisements. The local newspaper you can buy is the Express and Star newspaper. This costs l6p. Sometimes special editions are issued Eg When Princess Diana visited Brierley Hill.
